dataverse_file_added: A user added a file to a Dataverse dataset in a project
dataverse_file_removed: A user removed a file from a Dataverse dataset in a project
dataverse_dataset_linked: A user linked a Dataverse dataset to a project
dataverse_study_linked: A user linked a Dataverse dataset to a project
dataverse_dataset_published: A user published a new version of a Dataverse dataset to a project
dataverse_study_released: A user published a new version of a Dataverse dataset to a project
dataverse_node_authorized: A user authorized the Dataverse addon for a project
dataverse_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Dataverse addon for a project
dataverse_node_deauthorized_no_user: Dataverse addon for a project deauthorized
